Text:
Thank you from heart for your interest in unix !!

specially after what published by cryptome about microsoft !!

there is also a OS derived from ubuntu : superos

do you know it ?

Really great !

Ubuntu is a buggy mess. Avoid it like the plague. Use Debian if you want stability. If you want an easy and stable distro with multimedia preinstalled, use Mepis. Much better than Ubuntu for beginners.
